db:abstract.db:para: The QStyleOptionDockWidget class is used to describe the parameters for drawing a dock widget.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: QStyleOptionDockWidget contains all the information that QStyle functions need to draw graphical elements like QDockWidget.

For performance reasons, the access to the member variables is direct (i.e., using the . or -> operator). This low-level feel makes the structures straightforward to use and emphasizes that these are simply parameters used by the style functions.
For an example demonstrating how style options can be used, see the Styles example.

db:section.db:title: enum QStyleOptionDockWidget::StyleOptionType
db:section.db:para: This enum is used to hold information about the type of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleOption subclass.

db:td.db:para: The type of style option provided (SO_DockWidget for this class).

db:section.db:para: The type is used internally by QStyleOption, its subclasses, and qstyleoption_cast() to determine the type of style option. In general you do not need to worry about this unless you want to create your own QStyleOption subclass and your own styles.

db:section.db:title: enum QStyleOptionDockWidget::StyleOptionVersion
db:section.db:para: This enum is used to hold information about the version of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleOption subclass.
The version is used by QStyleOption subclasses to implement extensions without breaking compatibility. If you use qstyleoption_cast(), you normally do not need to check it.

db:section.db:title: QStyleOptionDockWidget::QStyleOptionDockWidget()
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QStyleOptionDockWidget, initializing the member variables to their default values.

db:section.db:title: QStyleOptionDockWidget::QStyleOptionDockWidget(const QStyleOptionDockWidget &other)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a copy of the other style option.

db:section.db:title: bool QStyleOptionDockWidget::closable
db:section.db:para: This variable holds whether the dock window is closable
The default value is true.

db:section.db:title: bool QStyleOptionDockWidget::floatable
db:section.db:para: This variable holds whether the dock window is floatable
The default value is true.

db:section.db:title: bool QStyleOptionDockWidget::movable
db:section.db:para: This variable holds whether the dock window is movable
The default value is false.

db:section.db:title: QString QStyleOptionDockWidget::title
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the title of the dock window
The default value is an empty string.

db:section.db:title: Obsolete Members for QStyleOptionDockWidget
db:section.db:para: The following members of class QStyleOptionDockWidget are deprecated. We strongly advise against using them in new code.

db:section.db:title: [deprecated] QStyleOptionDockWidgetV2
db:section.db:para: This typedef is deprecated. We strongly advise against using it in new code.
Synonym for QStyleOptionDockWidget.
